items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: US stocks closed sharply higher in a broad rally on Tuesday after data signaled a solid economy, but investors braced for volatile trading this week as voting was underway in an extremely tight U.S. presidential election.

items.title: Stock Radar: Titan, NTPC, Infosys, Dr Reddy’s Labs GAIL, Mankind Pharma, JK Tyre in focus on Wednesday
items.description: Stocks like Oil India, Max Healthcare Institute, Manappuram Finance, Berger Paints India, Datamatics Global Services, Hero MotoCorp, Premier Explosives, Infosys, and Coffee Day Enterprises will also be in focus on November 6.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade IndusInd Bank, Hindustan Copper, Pudumjee Paper, NMDC, Kirloskar Brothers, and others on Wednesday?
items.description: The trend is likely to be in favour of bulls, but the Nifty 50 needs to hold above all key moving averages for a sustainable rally. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Aditya Birla Capital| This NBFC is on the growth track, led by digital initiatives
items.description: Aditya Birla Capital (ABC) is the holding company for the financial services business of Aditya Birla group and holds majority stake in various subsidiaries, which operate mainly in the commercial and retail finance, housing finance, asset management, and life and health insurance segments. The company has been strategically growing its lending and other businesses in a calibrated manner, mining the existing customer base with more up-sale opportunities. Strong group synergies and branch expansion remain long-term drivers.

items.title: Premier Explosives shares in focus on winning order worth Rs 89.20 crore
items.description: Premier Explosives Share Price | A meeting of the board of directors of the company is scheduled to be held on November 11, 2024.

items.title: Brokerage Radar: Jefferies lowers target for Titan; Nomura cuts price aim on ABB India
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Titan, Dr Reddy's, GAIL and more.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: US stocks closed sharply higher in a broad rally on Tuesday after data signaled a solid economy, but investors braced for volatile trading this week as voting was underway in an extremely tight U.S. presidential election.

items.title: Live: Can Nifty build further gains amid US election uncertainty? | Opening Bell
items.description: In a twisting tale, Sensex and Nifty recovered from day's losses and finished yesterday's trade with over a percent rebound. Financial services and metal stocks help aid markets. Experts expect the index to face resistance at 24,500, with support placed around 23,800. US election outcome will dominate the Street tone today, with both Kamala Harris and Donald in a tight battle. This morning global cues are strong. US markets ended higher overnight while Asia Pacific markets were also off to a strong start. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Dr Reddy's, Titan, and Oil India. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Vaishali Parekh, Vice President - Technical Research, Prabhudas Liladher and Anshul Saigal—Market Expert

items.title: Lack of strong launch pipeline keep brokerages neutral over Dr Reddy's Labs
items.description: Even though Dr Reddy's showcased decent earnings performance after adjusting for one-offs in Q2, the absence of a strong launch pipeline keep brokerages cautious over its growth outlook.

items.title: Short Call | Harris vs Trump: Will Indian markets ride the blue wave or the red surge? Gland Pharma, ABB in focus
items.description: We deceive ourselves when we believe that past stock market return patterns provide the bounds by which we can predict the future - John Bogle

items.title: GAIL's Q2 earnings spark optimism; Morgan Stanley, Jefferies bullish, highlight growth triggers
items.description: Morgan Stanley and Jefferies have both issued positive outlooks on GAIL India stock, highlighting its potential for growth and re-rating.

items.title: Agri Picks Report November 06, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, India's food grain output during kharif season is estimated at a record 164.7 million tonnes due to good production of rice, jowar, and maize, according to the first advance estimate for 2024-25 (Jul-Jun) released by the government on Tuesday.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty turn green as US undergoes red vs blue face-off in presidential race
items.description: A Republican victory is expected to spark a short-term rally in domestic equities, but its sustainability will depend on ongoing earnings growth and valuation levels.

items.title: GAIL soars 5% on robust Q2 earnings; Morgan Stanley, Jefferies bullish, highlight growth triggers
items.description: Morgan Stanley and Jefferies have both issued positive outlooks on GAIL India stock, highlighting its potential for growth and re-rating.

items.title: RVNL emerges as lowest bidder for Bengaluru rail project, shares climb 5%
items.description: The project includes constructing stations at Heelalige, Singena Agrahara, Huskur, Ambedkar Nagar, Carmelaram, Bellandur, Marathahalli, Doddanakundi, and Kaggadasapura.

items.title: Colgate-Palmolive: Strategic initiatives, superior product mix drive growth
items.description: Company sees volume growth trends amid challenging operating environment

items.title: Samvat 2081| Time For Stock Pickers To Shine Post Recent Correction? Where To Invest Now?
items.description: As we enter Samvat 2081, investors are left contemplating what lies ahead for Indian equities. After a stellar rally, is it time for a reality check, as valuations remain high despite recent corrections? Experts say this period presents an opportune moment for stock pickers to shine, encouraging a bottom-up approach to investing. However, key risks loom on the horizon, including fluctuations in earnings and foreign institutional investor (FII) outflows, which warrant careful consideration. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Siddarth Bhamre, Asit C Mehta Investment Interrmediates on where are the markets and where to invest in Samvat 2081.

items.title: Hindustan Zinc stock plunges 8% as govt pares stake at sharp discount via OFS
items.description: Moneycontrol  had reported back in August that an OFS for Hindustan Zinc was expected before the end of FY25, following the Cabinet's 2022 approval to sell the government’s entire stake in the company.

items.title: Oil India stock climbs 6% as Q2 net profit zooms 464% YoY
items.description: Oil India has disclosed two new joint ventures to advance Compressed Biogas (CBG) projects—one with Hindustan Waste Treatment and another in collaboration with GPS Renewables and Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL).

items.title: Subscribe for Swiggy Ltd IPO; Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services, has come out with its report on Swiggy Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe” the ipo in its research report as on November 05 2024.

items.title: Titan Company: Second half of FY25 likely to be stronger
items.description: The cut in customs duty significantly boosted consumer sentiment, and Titan expects better growth in the second half of the fiscal.

items.title: RITES stock gains on bagging contract worth Rs 36 crore from Delhi Metro Rail Corporation
items.description: RITES stock climbed after securing a Rs 36.36 crore retrofit contract from Delhi Metro Rail Corporation, boosting its recent order book.

items.title: Hopes of a Trump win sparks 3% rally in Nifty IT; Infosys, TCS lead gains
items.description: All ten stocks within the index advanced by 1 to 4 percent, with Infosys, TCS, and HCLTech leading the charge.

items.title: Accumulate Larsen and Toubro Finance Ltd; target of Rs 160: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended accumulate rating on Larsen and Toubro Finance Ltd with a target price of Rs 160 in its research report dated November 05, 2024.

items.title: Triveni Engg stock drops 5% after Q2 loss, subdued profitability
items.description: Triveni Engg's net loss for the quarter was triggered by a weak operational performance as EBITDA margin took a sharp hit in Q2.

items.title: Hold NTPC; target of Rs 434: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended hold rating on NTPC with a target price of Rs 434 in its research report dated November 05, 2024.

items.title: SBI Q2 preview: NII, profit to grow in double-digits YoY amid healthy loan, deposit growth
items.description: SBI is expected to register healthy 10 percent YoY growth in net interest income (NII) to Rs 43,464 crore in Q2FY25

items.title: Buy Hindustan Unilever; target of Rs 2820: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Hindustan Unilever has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2820 in its research report dated November 05, 2024.
